name: .GMZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .GMZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Compressed project file created by YoYo Games GameMaker: Studio, a game development application; contains a project (.GMX file) that has been compressed for sharing; includes scripts, sprites, sounds, backgrounds, objects, fonts, shaders, constants, and rooms.

content: To create a GMZ file, select File → Export Project, verify the name and save location, and click Save.
To import a GMZ file, select File → Import Project... and click your project.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
